message.content:
I need to identify the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period from the income statement.

Looking at the income statement, the line item that represents the value of inventories sold would be "Cost of Goods Sold" (COGS). This is the standard financial line item that captures the cost of inventory that has been sold to customers during the reporting period.

In the income statement provided, I can see:
- Cost of Goods Sold: 20200000.00 (dated 2024-02-05)

Therefore, the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period is 20,200,000.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '20200000.00'}}
```
